Name: Pure Soul: The Journey of the Witch Emily
About the game: Pure Soul: The Witch's Journey Emily tells the story of a young girl who is looking for answers about her mother, she ends up embarking on a journey in a fantasy world full of adventures and dangers, now Emily has one more mission, save like people who are turning into monsters. Soul Mode. The Cat Transformation. Little witch Emily using her powers. Emily human exploring the fantasy world with her bicycle. Imagine living in a fantasy world as a powerful witch. Our protagonist was abandoned by her mother when she was just a child, her mother's disappearance was never resolved and is surrounded by mysteries, Embark today on this incredible adventure in search of answers.
